Text:
Don't downlad it. the quality of the video and of the audio is fantastic, but it is out of sync.
Don't waste your time here.

This is the regular edition [look the length:  2h58=178min < 208 min (special extended edition) < 228 min (Special Extended Blu-Ray Edition)]. And about the sync, it's ok here (using Media Player Clasic v. 1.6.0.4014). This torrent is just fine for me.
